text: George Edward Lowe (November 10, 1957 â€“ March 2, 2025) was an American voice actor. He was best known for voicing Space Ghost on the adult swim program Space Ghost: Coast to Coast. He also voiced Brak's Dad on The Brak Show. He was born in Dunedin, Florida. Lowe died on March 2, 2025 from a long-illness in Florida at the age of 67. ==Voice Acting== * Space Ghost: Coast to Coast - Space Ghost * Cartoon Planet - Space Ghost * The Brak Show - Dad and Space Ghost * Aqua Teen Hunger Force - various characters * Aqua Teen Hunger Force Colon Movie Film for Theaters - Space Ghost ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2025 deaths Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Florida Category:American video game actors Category:Disease-related deaths in Florida
title: George Lowe
